page.title: 14FAMILY LIFE
page.content: {GINETTE NOBBS { }FAMILY BACKGROUND two sisters one brother. Spent childhood in{ESSEX }, on leaving school worked as a {BANK {CLARK }in and around {LONDON } {BRIAN NOBBS One sister. Served an apprenticeship as a {SHIPWRIGHT,}spent ten years in the {ROYAL GROUP}of {LONDON DOCKS} engaged mainly in ship repair . Saw the decline of this thriving part, then moved to{TILBURY,}where the main work was specialist cargo handling, with the advent of more container ships work began to decline. This was one of the factors in the decision to move home, change our life style and the way of earning a living. Our main income is from the{CARPENTRY} and {BUILDING }business which BN is engaged in. The twenty one acre small holding ,
